team_section.title:
From Tokyo to Saigon,
We come from all
over the world

team_members.bio: Vicki Dang a.k.a Wii-ki is a self-taught 3D motion designer/director. Originally from Saigon, She has been working as a 3D Animator and Art director ever since. Her clients are Maserati, Louis Vuitton, Nike China, IKEA, MOAG, Oppo, Musiversal, FreeFire... She aims to create unconventional visual dimensions for digital spaces while implementing diverse cultural identities for the new generations. Deconstructing the concept of "westernizing" and "localizing," Vicki seeks to implement unbounded creativity and craftsmanship into the work.

Robin is a multi-disciplinary artist focused on Film Direction and Creative direction. 
Although he grew up in a multicultural family, he has found his home in Asia. Fascinated by traditions and the ever-growing youth culture, Robin focuses on creating compelling storytelling and immersive experiences. Robin has been directing worldwide for international brands (Louis Vuitton, Adidas, Cartier, Onitsuka Tiger...) and renowned artists (Kiko Mizuhara, Son Tung MTP, AngelaBaby, Jessica Jung, Henry Lau…).

team_members.role: CEO & Co-Founder of monopo inc. / monopo Tokyo
team_members.bio: Yoshi started out as a professional bassist before he went on co-found monopo while attending Waseda University (Tokyo, Japan) with fellow bassist Shun. At monopo, Yoshiyuki leads the groups client and talent expansion, as well as business development including founding poweredby.tokyo (2016), monopo London (2019), monopo New York (2021) and monopo Saigon (2021).

team_members.role: COO, CTO & Co-Founder of monopo inc. / monopo Tokyo
team_members.bio: Shun co-founded monopo in 2011 alongside his friend Yoshiyuki who he met in band club whilst studying at Waseda University in Tokyo. With his profound knowledge of web marketing, system development and technology, Shun consults our clients to help them achieve their communication goals. Shun is a natural problem solver, whether it’s in sales, new technologies or branding initiatives, he seeks to find creative solutions.

team_members.role: Global Development Director of monopo inc.
team_members.bio: British born, South African raised, Japan nurtured. Georgi studied film and media at the University of Cape Town before diving into a career spanning across theatre/film production management and advertising from London to Tokyo. Since moving to Tokyo in 2015, she has been working as a producer in the Japanese advertising industry. At monopo Tokyo, Georgi leads global campaigns/branding for various clients, as well as directing the monopo's international expansion.

team_members.role: ART DIRECTOR, DESIGNER OF MONOPO TOKYO
team_members.bio: Tran Minh is an art director and designer at monopo, born in France and based in Tokyo. He has a master degree in digital communication where he established his skills in web development, product design and digital marketing. Tran is passionate about experimenting with motion design and always willing to explore alongside ever-changing technology. As an art director, what matters most to him is to communicate messages that speak to human experiences or even social issues that are shared in societies across the world.

cookie.text: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience.

video_text_rows.text: Born in Asia, raised by the world — monopo is the global fulcrum between East and West. We blur boundaries of difference, creating design that stands the test of time.

Collaboration over competition — Creativity, for monopo saigon, is like having a nabe with friends where we combine the creativity that sets us apart. Through collaborative initiative, we bring your visions to fruition.
We create to evoke — We start where others stop, we question the norms, we refuse to be redundant,  monopo saigon seeks to deliver original creative solutions.

saigon_soul_section.text: Saigon Souls captures a state of mind. You are Saigonese if you feel like you are, whether you just arrived, just returned or have been living here your whole life. Most of all, just being in Saigon makes you part of the Saigon Souls.
saigon_soul_section.label: Discover Saigon Soul

og_meta_data.og_title: monopo saigon | Tokyo-born digitally-driven creative studio.
og_meta_data.og_description:
We Integrate collaborate, and challenge.
We are digital natives embracing the creative freedom to produce solutions
that connect, communicate, and inspire.

team_section.title: Từ Tokyo đến Sài Gòn, chúng tôi đến từ khắp nơi trên thế giới

team_members.bio: Vicki Dang a.k.a Wii-ki là một nhà thiết kế / đạo diễn chuyển động 3D tự học và hy vọng một ngày nào đó sẽ đạo diễn bộ phim hoạt hình của riêng mình. Vicky tin rằng trí tưởng tượng phá bỏ mọi giới hạn, vì vậy cô tập trung vào việc khám phá các công cụ hoặc/ và phần mềm truyền thông mới để khắc họa và truyền đạt những ý tưởng và tầm nhìn độc đáo.

Hiện đang sinh sống và làm việc ở châu Á, Robin say mê việc làm phim mang màu sắc truyền thống địa phương, công nghệ cũng như văn hóa của người trẻ. Anh có kinh nghiệm làm việc cùng các thương hiệu quốc tế lớn (Louis Vuitton, Chanel, Uniqlo, Adidas, Cartier, v.v.) với tư cách giám đốc sáng tạo và giám đốc. Robin hiện đang dành tâm huyết với chuỗi phim hoạt hình khoa học viễn tưởng và phim điện ảnh của riêng mình. Bên cạnh đó, anh muốn thử thách bản thân bằng những phong cách kể chuyện và trải nghiệm hấp dẫn với sự kết hợp của hoạt hình 3D, quay chuyển động và âm nhạc cho một dự án bảo tàng kỹ thuật số.

team_members.role: CEO & Co-Founder of monopo inc. / monopo Tokyo
team_members.bio: Yoshi từng là một tay bass chuyên nghiệp trước khi tham gia đồng sáng lập monopo khi theo học tại Đại học Waseda (Tokyo, Nhật Bản) với tay bass Shun. Tại monopo, Yoshiyuki dẫn đầu nhóm khách hàng và mở rộng phát triển tài năng, cũng như phát triển kinh doanh bao gồm cả sáng lập powerby.tokyo (2016), monopo London (2019), monopo New York (2021) và monopo Sài Gòn (2021).

team_members.role: COO, CTO & Co-Founder of monopo inc. / monopo Tokyo
team_members.bio: Shun đồng sáng lập monopo vào năm 2011 cùng với bạn mình là Yoshiyuki, cả hai gặp  nhau ở câu lạc bộ ban nhạc khi đang theo học tại Đại học Waseda ở Tokyo. Với kiến ​​thức sâu rộng về tiếp thị web, phát triển hệ thống và công nghệ, Shun tư vấn cho khách hàng của chúng tôi nhằm giúp họ đạt được mục tiêu truyền thông của mình. Shun có tài năng đặc biệt trong giải quyết vấn đề trong các lĩnh vực như bán hàng, công nghệ mới hay sáng kiến ​​xây dựng thương hiệu, anh luôn có thể tìm kiếm các giải pháp sáng tạo.

team_members.role: Global Development Director of monopo inc.
team_members.bio: Là người gốc Anh, lớn lên ở Nam Phi, lập nghiệp ở Nhật Bản, Georgi theo học ngành điện ảnh và truyền thông tại Đại học Cape Town trước khi bắt đầu sự nghiệp trải dài từ lĩnh vực quản lý nhà hát / sản xuất phim đến quảng cáo ở London và rồi Tokyo. Từ khi chuyển đến Tokyo vào năm 2015, cô trở thành một nhà sản xuất trong ngành quảng cáo Nhật Bản. Tại monopo Tokyo, Georgi dẫn đầu các chiến dịch toàn cầu / xây dựng thương hiệu với đa dạng đối tượng khác hàng, cũng như điều hành định hướng mở rộng monopo tới thị trường quốc tế.

team_members.role: ART DIRECTOR, DESIGNER OF MONOPO TOKYO
team_members.bio: Trần Minh là giám đốc nghệ thuật và nhà thiết kế của monopo. Anh sinh ra ở Pháp và hiện đang sinh sống ở Tokyo. Minh có bằng thạc sĩ về truyền thông kỹ thuật số, nơi giúp anh củng cố các kỹ năng về phát triển web, thiết kế sản phẩm và tiếp thị kỹ thuật số. Minh đam mê thử nghiệm thiết kế chuyển động và luôn sẵn sàng khám phá những thay đổi liên tục của công nghệ. Điều quan trọng nhất đối với một giám đốc nghệ thuật như Minh là truyền tải những thông điệp về trải nghiệm của con người hoặc thậm chí là các vấn đề xã hội chung ở nhiều nơi trên thế giới.

cookie.text: Trang web này sử dụng cookie để đảm bảo bạn có được trải nghiệm tốt nhất trên trang web của chúng tôi.

video_text_rows.text: Ra đời ở Châu Á và lớn lên từ thế giới - monopo Saigon là điểm kết nối giữa phương Đông và phương Tây. Chúng tôi xóa mờ ranh giới của những khác biệt và kiến tạo những thiết kế vượt qua thử thách thời gian.

Cộng tác thay vì cạnh tranh - Sáng tạo, đối với monopo Saigon, như một cuộc gặp gỡ với bạn bè, nơi cộng hưởng những nguồn lực nghệ thuật khác nhau. Bằng các sáng kiến hợp tác, chúng tôi biến tầm nhìn của bạn trở thành hiện thực.

monopo Saigon  hướng đến giải pháp sáng tạo nghệ thuật nguyên bản. Chúng tôi sáng tạo để khơi gợi – chúng tôi bắt đầu từ điểm dừng của người khác và luôn vượt khỏi giới hạn các tiêu chuẩn thông thường nhằm mang đến những giá trị thiết thực.

saigon_soul_section.label: Khám phá Saigon Soul
saigon_soul_section.text: Saigon Souls thể hiện tinh thần của những cư dân Sài Gòn. Bạn là người Sài Gòn nếu bạn cảm thấy chất Sài Gòn trong mình, dù bạn mới đến đây, vừa quay lại hay đã sống ở đây cả đời. Quan trọng hơn cả, chỉ cần ở Sài Gòn , bạn đã trở thành một phần của Saigon Souls.

client_section.title: Niềm tin từ khách hàng
client_section.label_button: Các dự án khác trên monopo.tokyo

og_meta_data.og_description: Chúng tôi Hòa nhập, Cộng tác và Thách thức. Là những công dân của thời đại kĩ thuật số, chúng tôi đề cao sự tự do trong sáng tạo nghệ thuật, hướng đến  những  giải pháp giúp kết nối, giao tiếp và truyền cảm hứng.
og_meta_data.og_title: monopo saigon | Studio kỹ thuật số - Ra đời ở Tokyo - Thúc đẩy bởi sự sáng tạo

team_section.title:
从东京到西贡，
我们来自世界各地

team_members.bio: Vicki Dang 又名 Wii-ki ，是一位自学成才的 3D 动画设计师/导演，她希望有一天能执导自己的动画电影。 她相信想象力赋予人们无限，因此她的实践侧重于探索新媒体工具和软件，来描绘和传达独特的想法和愿景。
Robin 现居亚洲，他着迷于当地传统的电影制作，以及青年/科技文化。 他曾为国际各大品牌担任创意总监和导演（Louis Vuitton, Chanel, Uniqlo, Adidas, Cartier等）。 如今正在着手推动他自己的原创科幻动画故事片，他不断挑战自己去创造引人入胜的叙事风格和体验，将 3D 动画、动作捕捉技术和现场音乐结合用于数字博物馆般的项目。

team_members.role: CEO & Co-Founder of monopo inc. / monopo Tokyo
team_members.bio: Yoshi 曾经是一名专业贝斯手，之后他与另一位贝斯手朋友Shun在早稻田大学（日本东京）共同创立了 monopo。在 monopo，Yoshiyuki 带领集团客户、人才扩张以及商务发展，包括创立了 powerby.tokyo（2016 ），monopo London（2019 ），monopo New York（2021 ）和 monopo Saigon（2021 ）。

team_members.role: COO, CTO & Co-Founder of monopo inc. / monopo Tokyo
team_members.bio: Shun 于 2011 年，与他在东京早稻田大学学习期间、乐队俱乐部认识的朋友 Yoshiyuki 共同创立了 monopo。 凭借在网络营销、系统开发和技术方面的深厚知识，Shun 为客户提供咨询，帮助他们实现他们的沟通目标。 Shun 是一个天生的问题解决者，无论是在销售、新技术还是品牌推广方面，他都寻求找到创造性的解决方案。
Georgi出生于英国，长大于南非，培养于日本。她曾在开普敦大学学习电影和媒体，尔后从伦敦搬到东京，从事戏剧/电影制作管理和广告领域的职业生涯。 自 2015 年搬到东京以来，她一直在日本广告行业担任制片人。 在 monopo Tokyo，Georgi 为各种客户引领全球活动/品牌推广，并指导 monopo 的国际化扩张。
team_members.role: Global Development Director of monopo inc.

cookie.text: 本网站使用cookies，以确保访问者在访问网站时获得最佳体验。

video_text_rows.text: 在亚洲出生，由世界抚育而成长— monopo身处东方与西方之间的轴点。 我们将差别的边界模糊，创造经得起时间考验的设计。
协作胜过竞争—创造力，对于 monopo Saigon 来说，就像与朋友一起吃日式火锅，揉杂了各种与众不同的创造力。 通过协作倡议，我们将你的愿景变为现实。
我们用创造来唤醒—我们从其他人止步之处启程，我们质疑规范，拒绝成为多余，monopo Saigon 致力于呈现具有独创性的创意方案。

saigon_soul_section.text: “Saigon Souls”捕捉一种心智状态。 如果你觉得自己像西贡人，无论你刚到这里，刚回来，或是已经在这里生活了一辈子，那么你就是西贡人。 最重要的是，生活在西贡，让你成为“Saigon Souls”的一部分。
saigon_soul_section.label: Discover Saigon Soul

og_meta_data.og_title: monopo saigon | Tokyo-born digitally-driven creative studio.
og_meta_data.og_description: 我们融合，协作，并挑战。 我们是数字原生代，信奉创想自由，产出解决方案，使其得以连接、交流和启发灵感。

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.text: For the BnA Hotel, 「BnA Alter Museum」 project　- an Artwork in which you can sleep in Kyoto - , we realized the branding, website, brand movie and room guide app.

og_meta_data.og_title: BnA | PROJECTS | monopo saigon
og_meta_data.og_description: For the BnA Hotel, 「BnA Alter Museum」 project　- an Artwork in which you can sleep in Kyoto - , we realized the branding, website, brand movie and room guide app.

text_img.title: Logo Design
text_img.text: As BnA provided a white canvas for Artist's expression in the 「BnA Alter Museum」 project, we decided to use the shape of Kyoto's, Tenmacho area (Kagyoku district) where the hotel is located as the logo base to express the freedom given to Artists and guests. In addition, the angle of the lines in the typographie mimicked the ones of Kawaramachi street, facing the 「BnA Alter Museum」, emphasizing the fact that Kyoto is a community where many fulfilling experienced can be lived.

text_img.title: Website like Museum
text_img.text:
This overnight museum was designed by 15 Artists and 9 Art Directors, who created 31 Art works "in which you can sleep in" and a vertical gallery of 30 meters high.\
To express the depth of this "place for experimentation that is nor a museum, nor a hotel", we chose to play around the minimal concept of a white cube, inspired by the architecture of the building.

For the brand movie we created, the central theme was “Liminal”, which means threshold of perception.\
\
The 「BnA Alter Museum」 enables to experience liminality, that makes the border with reality unclear due to the extraordinary experiences and sensations felt by the guests using VFX technology. Liminality is a feeling, a state of mind, a physicality, a sensation, an idea somewhere in between reality and unworldly perception, simultaneously forming, un-forming, at the threshold of transformation. The question is : What is reality?
text_img.title: Brand Movie

client_and_role.role: Art Direction, Branding, Video production, Website

team-list.team-member-role: Project Manager & Web Planner & Application Planner & Designer & Back-End Engineer

_data.title: Canada Goose – The Art of Film AR Tour Berlin

og_meta_data.og_title: Hello Canada Goose – The Art of Film AR Tour Berlina PARIS | PROJECTS | monopo saigon
og_meta_data.og_description: Canada Goose trusted monopo with the conception, creation and production of a virtual tour of Berlin that shines a light on underrepresented artisans in the film industry.We launched a web app encouraging people to explore 5 iconic Berlin film locations and discover all about the artisans of film through AR and VR content.

challenge.text: Canada Goose trusted monopo with the conception, creation and production of a virtual tour of Berlin that shines a light on underrepresented artisans in the film industry.We launched a web app encouraging people to explore 5 iconic Berlin film locations and discover all about the artisans of film through AR and VR content.
challenge.title: Challenge

text_img.title: Celebrate Canada Goose's decade-long support for the film industry through an immersive experience during the Berlin Film Festival
text_img.text: Canada Goose has been a partner to the film industry for years. Its winter wear has kept crews warm in the harshest shoot environments. This relationship with the artisans of film is celebrated every year during the Berlin Film Festival. Together with its partner, Studio Babelsberg, Canada Goose creates initiatives that shine a light on the artisans behind the camera. This year however, no physical festival took place so the ask was to create a virtual experience that would allow people in Berlin and beyond to still discover the magic of film outside of the traditional festival.

The idea was to create an augmented reality tour, guiding users through five iconic Berlin film locations and providing them with behind-the-scenes content of the films that were crafted there. We designed and developed the "Canada Goose: The Art of Film web app" and launched it both in Berlin for residents and through social media for remote visitors.
text_img.title: The Art of Film Tour Berlin 2021

text_img.text:
With 'Live in the Open' as Canada Goose's tagline, we wanted to motivate people to go outside. The web app guides visitors through five locations, where behind-the-scenes content is triggered. Berlin residents could pick up a free postcard at the Canada Goose Berlin store and use it as an AR trigger to view the content at the exact location where the films were shot.\
\
Not to exclude people outside of Berlin, we also created a VR environment in the app. At-home visitors across the world could take a similar tour in virtual reality, enjoying the same content without being present on location.\
\
As an extra incentive we included a chance to win a behind-the-scenes tour at Babelsberg Film Studios in Berlin, for people who participated.
text_img.title: Live in the open

text_img.text: For the visual direction, we merged the worlds of craftsmanship and luxury. This was done by integrating handwritten notes (mimicking directors notes) as graphic elements, designing a paper-feel map for people to navigate Berlin, and commissioning hand-drawn illustrations from French artist Pascal Pillard to represent the different films in our AR/VR world.
text_img.title: Digital meets handmade craftmanship

text_img.text:
The app revolved around three main content buckets: the 5 locations in Berlin, the films that were shot there and the interesting stories of the artisans that worked behind the scenes on these films.\
\
At each location, visitors could experience a variety of behind-the-scenes content. Artisans that had worked on the different films shared audio recordings, fun facts, behind-the-scene images, videos and photo galleries that unveiled the magic that went into creating films on these locations.\
\
Based on the testimonies and visual content provided by the artisans, we designed a variety of templates that appeared as clickable hotspots on the illustrations, in the AR/VR environment.
text_img.title: The artisan speaks

text_img.text:
To amplify the tour through paid and organic social media, we produced a campaign video. The film takes the viewer on The Art of Film-tour and provides them with a sample of the experience. Curious viewers are encouraged to visit the Canada Goose store in Berlin, pick up an AR postcard and start the tour.\
\
We also developed a key visual that could be deployed flexibly wherever a media opportunity arose. The visual became part of the PR toolkit, was printed large to create an in-store display and was used as a paid-media asset online.
text_img.title: Pick up your postcard and enjoy the tour

client_and_role.role: Creative Direction, Concept, Art Direction, UX/UI Design, Web Design, AR Web App Development, Video/Still and Print Production

og_meta_data.og_title: Canada Goose — Nomad Collection | PROJECTS | monopo saigon
og_meta_data.og_description: monopo was tasked with producing a 360 creative campaign for Canada Goose and Gore-Tex’s spring and rain inspired Nomad Capsule collection. We took charge of the idea, creative direction, art direction, copywriting, video production, editorial and social content, retail theater, and international art installations.

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.text: monopo was tasked with producing a 360 creative campaign for Canada Goose and Gore-Tex’s spring and rain inspired Nomad Capsule collection. We took charge of the idea, creative direction, art direction, copywriting, video production, editorial and social content, retail theater, and international art installations.

text_img.text: Canada Goose is a function first, highly technical brand that offers extreme protection from the planet’s harshest climates. While this offering has served them and humanity well for the past 60 years, the company wanted help establishing itself as the leader in all condition outerwear among consumers. To help raise awareness, they enlisted the help of monopo who created a full 360-degree, multi-sensory campaign inspired by Japan and the nation’s spiritual connection to its elements.
text_img.title: Art, craft, and </br>the spirit of Japan
New territory. </br>New Competition. </br>New Challenges.
text_img.text: Although Canada Goose is well known all over the world as the leader in extreme weather protection, it is a new player on the scene when it comes to the spring season fashion. As a temperate climate brand, awareness is low. The market is currently seeing a shift in perceptions and consumer behavior as the line between fashion and function becomes more blurred.This territory of cross-pollination between fashion and function is Canada Goose’s opportunity to stake their claim, and take their rightful position in the minds of consumers as the undisputed leader in all-season, all-condition outerwear.The question was: How do we communicate this mission and new position to a wider customer base and the world at large?

The appetite for Canada Goose products in Asian markets is growing at an exponential rate, particularly in fashion-conscious nations like Japan and China. To satisfy this demand, Canada Goose partnered with GORE-TEX to launch the 'Nomad' line which celebrates and embraces the unpredictability of spring rain.

Born in Japan and inspired by the nation's rich culture, the campaign functions as a love letter to its people. We collaborated with two Japanese artists, acoustic designer Kouichi Okamoto and calligraphy artist Aoi Yamaguchi, to bring authenticity to the product by telling real stories of real people. The campaign is a celebration of rain, its life-giving properties and how it has inspired art and creation throughout Japan's history.

By marrying the cutting-edge technology of the products with the symbolic relationship Japanese culture has with the outdoors — spring rain specifically, our goal was to achieve function-first positioning in the minds of the consumers.
text_img.title: A Celebration </br>of Rain
A Global Multi-Sensory </br>Approach
text_img.text:
“Rain is one of the familiar phenomena that is felt by all the body’s senses” muses Okamoto in the film. To do justice to rain's sense-engulfing qualities, we crafted a multi-sensory 360 campaign experience in line with Okamoto-san’s words.

Through film, music, imagery, scent, retail theater, and art installation, we showcased the unparalleled technical and functional prowess of Canada Goose while allowing the world the opportunity to see, feel, smell, move and interact with every aspect of the brand experience. The outcome? A truly immersive celebration of nature, art, and the human condition.

text_img.title: Kouichi Okamoto  </br>— Acoustic Artist
text_img.text: Okamoto is a product designer and sound producer who has been releasing his sounds on the Dutch techno label “X-Trax” since 1997. In 2006, alongside co-conspirators Ayako Nakanishi and Yuichi Yamaguchi he founded Kyouei Design, a design and manufacturing company which specializes in crafting groundbreaking experiential works. His creations have been exhibited in Japan and abroad (SF MoMA, Brazil, Israel, V&A Museum)

Okamoto makes art out of the sound of rain, creating a symphony of noise that harmonizes with nature. Born and raised in Japan, Okamoto says everything he does is 'shaped by the tradition of minimalism and simplicity.' The sound piece he created for this project was captured on location during the shoot in Wakayama, one of the rainiest corners of Japan.

text_img.title: Aoi Yamaguchi  </br>— Calligraphy Artist
text_img.text: Aoi Yamaguchi began her calligraphy career at age 6, training under the watchful eye of master Zuiho Sato. Her works juxtapose traditional Eastern classical culture with contemporary artistic expressions. Through her performances, Yamaguchi transforms the two-dimensional art of Japanese calligraphy into an entirely full-body physical manifestation.

For this project, she created two large-scale Japanese characters, which together represent “spring rain.” She was inspired by "the long rainy days in the early spring air: long-lasting but not relentless, gentle." Through wide, open strokes, Yamaguchi translated the essence of spring rain into her calligraphy; she explains, “I wanted to symbolize the raindrops of regeneration falling gently straight from the sky.”

We shot the film in Wakayama prefecture with sound and product designer, artist, and music producer Kouichi Okamoto and on the streets of Tokyo with calligraphy artist Aoi Yamaguchi. The film tells the story of two unique artists inspired by the rain and its three core elements: Atmosphere, earth, and water.
text_img.title: The Film

text_img.text:
We traveled across the ancient pilgrimage route of Kumano Kodo, where for over millennia people from across the world have made the arduous journey. Sound designer Kouichi Okamoto hunted and gathered the aural manifestation of the elements, capturing the essence of rain in its purest form.

Meanwhile, calligraphy artist Aoi Yamaguchi traversed the dense urban jungle of Tokyo. Drawing inspiration from her surroundings she crafts her shodo performance, an act deeply rooted in nature and inspired by the seasons. Her performance scenes were shot in studio with an elaborate rain system custom fitted for the occasion.

We transformed the retail interior of the Canada Goose Sendagaya flagship store to spotlight and feature the GORE-TEX Nomad Capsule Collection as a commissioned artwork.Elements of the retail theater focused on the senses to bring attention
to the subtle characteristics of rain, spring, and the lush forestry of Wakayama.

A global collaborative effort by Japanese, American, and European artists, the installation was comprised of a collection of carefully considered pieces. The botanical window displays and room scents were inspired by the lush forests of Wakayama, which unified with the aural backdrop composed by Okamoto.

An oversized lightbox image and the film were displayed on a four-meter screen for passersby to see. The entire retail theater experience was designed to function as an art gallery with artist name cards placed throughout the space explaining each artists’ unique contribution to the project. The result was a full multi-sensory experience for visitors where they could feel the essence of Japan and the campaign as a whole.
text_img.title: A Multi — Sensory  </br>Gallery Experience

text_img.text:
The Japanese language has over 50 words for rain. This cultural idiosyncrasy was the inspiration for us to explore the themes of sound, rain, ink, and Japanese culture. To further our exploration of Japan’s relationship with rainfall, we created an immersive installation at Milan Design Week in close collaboration with Okamoto.

Taking over the courtyard of a 19th-century building in the heart of Zone Tortona, the immersive installation invited visitors to immerse themselves in a fully interactive experience.

The visitors were led through a mirror tunnel of three-meter LCD screens looping the Nomad hero film before arriving in the courtyard to the sounds of a bespoke rain inspired set created by Okamoto for the occasion.
Dotted throughout the space were wooden buckets filled with water for guests to throw at the wall to reveal various Japanese kanji hidden beneath layers of hydrochromatic ink. Using a web AR app we programmed and designed, the guests could have the wet kanji revealed by putting their phone screens up to the wall. The event was a resounding success attracting over 1500 guests and got picked up by various local and international media.
text_img.title: 50 Words for Rain  </br>at Milan Design Week

client_and_role.role: Creative direction, Art direction, Video production, Editorial and SNS, Retail theater, Art installation

og_meta_data.og_title: SKYLER DIGITAL KOL | PROJECTS | monopo saigon
og_meta_data.og_description: With the merging of the metaverse and celebrity culture, virtual Influencers have become creative medium that can offer exciting way to interact with young generations. We were approached by brands that are interested in virtual influencers, one of them is FreeFire mobile game whom want to launch an MV for one of their gaming character - SKYLER

challenge.title: Description
challenge.text: With the merging of the metaverse and celebrity culture, virtual Influencers have become creative medium that can offer exciting way to interact with young generations. We were approached by brands that are interested in virtual influencers, one of them is Freefire mobile game whom want to launch an MV for one of their gaming character - SKYLER

text_img.title: Challenge
text_img.text: There are a few challenges. Freefire has had many characters developed for their game before but our challenge was to make the look of SKYLER look as real as the human version - Sơn Tùng MTP, from facial expressions and gestures and performance styles while keeping the duality of this character. Another obstacle was that we also only had 2 months to finish off the VFX production, including reimagining the futuristic HO CHI MINH city and the iconic tower Bitexco.

text_img.title: Creative Solution
text_img.text: We worked closely with our 3D team from BADCLAY studio to develp the character and build the futuristic world he is in. With SKYLER, we need to emphasize the duality in his character - one is the boss and another one is the daredevil, free artist. The story is based on Sơn Tùng MTP's real life story, and the music video is the statement of his achievement and duality successes in his career. Overall, we have over 10 animators and lookdev artists to develop, manually rig and animate SKYLER based on footages we shot on set on one day, we really pushed the VFX team to work with what they have with such limited shooting and post production time.

client_and_role.role: Creative Direction, Character Design, Concept Development, Art Direction, Video and Visual Production

team-list.team-member-name: Vicki Dang (monopo Saigon), Cao Hoàng Long
Robin Mahieux (monopo Saigon), Anh Phi Cako

_data.title: La Dame de Soie – Cartier x Nowness

og_meta_data.og_title: La Dame de Soie – Cartier x Nowness | PROJECTS | monopo saigon
og_meta_data.og_description: Out of collaboration from Cartier and Nowness, we were in charge of creating a short, stylish semi-fictionalization of Madame Wellington Koo’s life and influence on Cartier, brought into a contemporary framing through carefully researched scripting and art direction.

challenge.title: Description
challenge.text: Out of collaboration from Cartier and Nowness, we were in charge of creating a short, stylish semi-fictionalization of Madame Wellington Koo’s life and influence on Cartier, brought into a contemporary framing through carefully researched scripting and art direction.

text_img.title: Challenge
text_img.text: Working with the internationally renowned actress Li Meng ( A touch of Sin, Dead Pigs, ...) helped us bring to life the perfect vision of how Madame Wellington Koo would be today. Due to geographic differences, we had to manage two different shoots in Shanghai, where the actress located and London

text_img.title: Creative Direction
text_img.text: Madame Wellington Koo/ Huang Hui-lan was an influential Chinese/Indonesian Socialite who became a muse for Cartier in the ’20s, and through their relationship, she introduced him to various Chinese artisanal and aesthetic influences that informed his work. Our film takes moments from her life and imbues them into a scripted short ‘fashion’ style film that celebrates the woman herself and Chinese aesthetics and craftsmanship. It is a celebration of the diverse vision of Cartier and the wonder of its influence on cross-cultural collaboration.

client_and_role.role: Production, Post production, Direction, Creative Direction

team-list.team-member-name: Robin Mahieux (monopo Saigon), Anh Phi Cako
Fender Hsu, Vany Sun, Andy Ye

og_meta_data.og_title: Night Goggles | PROJECTS | monopo saigon
og_meta_data.og_description: The label' Mind of a Genius' reached out to us to create a music video for the artist Mindchatter and gave us complete control over the creative concept and direction. As the project happened to be during the pandemic, the inspiration came from the moment we ask ourselves this question: where would the outside of earth want to be happy and be dancing forever, especially during this pandemic? We tried to describe a world where we could be running on the massive fields, breathing the fresh air without having to come back from where we were, discovering worlds endlessly, as an echo to one of the big question humanity have been asking: what's next?

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.text: The label' Mind of a Genius' reached out to us to create a music video for the artist Mindchatter and gave us complete control over the creative concept and direction. As the project happened to be during the pandemic, the inspiration came from the moment we ask ourselves this question: where would the outside of earth want to be happy and be dancing forever, especially during this pandemic? We tried to describe a world where we could be running on the massive fields, breathing the fresh air without having to come back from where we were, discovering worlds endlessly, as an echo to one of the big question humanity have been asking: what's next?

text_img.title: Challenge
text_img.text: This song reminds us about being free of the burdens of every day, so we thought of a character with no physical being to represent that idea. We want to convey a good story. Thus, the man who finds a pair of goggles that changes his life came into our minds. He represents the enlightened being that figures out the common problems but decides to be joyful instead, eventually starts dancing his ways to happiness. We only had one month to finish and we also wanted to develop a personal dancing style and human-like movements for the character. As a note, the client was in New York, so we had to make everything entirely remotely.

text_img.title: Creative Solution
text_img.text: We wanted to emphasize escapism as the primary goal. Hence, the actual shoot versus the dreamy 3D part came into place. With the street of Saigon, our friend and Director of Photography, Ray Lavers, quickly did the real-life shoots in 2 hours during the quarantine time. To ensure our main character is getting lost, we thought dancing is the best way to portray it, especially when the main character is invisible. We asked our choreographer La Zung to do a quick freestyle on top of the music, motion-captured for 3D animation. Vicki and Robin worked together to create the worlds and rhythms inside the MV to deliver the feeling of being free. It is not like we knew every step what the MV would look like, but we wanted to be free to create, just like the song itself.

client_and_role.role: Motion Capture, Creative  and 3D art Direction, Direction, Post production

team-list.team-member-name: Vicki Dang (monopo Saigon), Robin Mahieux (monopo Saigon)
Anh Phi Cako, Andrew Boggs, & Connor Boggs

_data.title: Super Dan Origin Digital Graphic Novel

og_meta_data.og_title: Super Dan Origin Digital Graphic Novel | PROJECTS | monopo saigon
og_meta_data.og_description: When monopo London was invited to launch the Instagram account for Chinese badminton legend Lin Dan, we decided to re-introduce the world to the genius that he is. In collaboration with illustrators AmCo Studio we crafted a graphic novel for the digital age. Scrollable, swipeable, shareable. A nine-episode Origin Story retelling Lin Dan’s rise from birth to superhero status.

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.text: When monopo London was invited to launch the Instagram account for Chinese badminton legend Lin Dan, we decided to re-introduce the world to the genius that he is. In collaboration with illustrators AmCo Studio we crafted a graphic novel for the digital age. Scrollable, swipeable, shareable. A nine-episode Origin Story retelling Lin Dan’s rise from birth to superhero status.

text_img.title: Re-introducing badminton’s greatest legend to the world
text_img.text:
monopo London was invited to help launch the Instagram channel for Lin Dan, badminton’s greatest ever player and Chinese national hero.\
\
But Lin Dan didn’t join Instagram to become famous. He already was. What he wanted was to connect with the fans he couldn’t reach before. Fans across the world that had seen him play and know his fame but didn’t feel intimately connected with the Chinese star.\
\
We wanted to treat Lin Dan’s introduction to Instagram as a renewed introduction to the world.

text_img.title: Creating a graphic novel for Instagram: the Super Dan origin story
text_img.text:
When Lin beat former World #1 Peter Gade in 2004 as a 21 year old rookie, Peter gave him the nickname Super Dan. A superhero in the making. The nickname stuck and fans have been calling Lin Dan Super Dan ever since.\
\
But Lin’s rise to superhero status didn’t come easy. Many fans don’t know about the path Lin went on from birth to being Super Dan. Our idea: to create an Origin Story befitting a true superhero. A retelling of Lin’s life before his global fame.\
\
We decided to create a graphic novel for the Instagram age. A scrollable, swipeable, shareable graphic novel depicting the life of Lin in a way nobody had seen it before.

We worked with AmCo Studio and their team of talented illustrators to craft 9 episodes of the graphic novel. Every episode is a 10-frame carousel that reads as a traditional graphic novel. We also created a bespoke cover illustration for every episode, creating a real sense of collectability across the volumes.\
\
The 9 chapters show Lin Dan growing up as a child, going through his teenage years and displaying early signs of genius throughout - but equally the tribulations that shaped him. A new chapter was released every day, building up to the final chapter in which Lin Dan is given his title of Super Dan.\
\
A particularly powerful chapter was episode 8, entirely dedicated to the rivalry between Lin Dan and his frenemy Lee Chong Wei. The chapter plays out as an epic battle between two athletes ready to dominate the world.
text_img.title: A finely illustrated graphic novel in 9 episodes

client_and_role.role: Concept, Creative Direction, Art Direction, Design

og_meta_data.og_title: Takashi Murakami x Vans | PROJECTS | monopo saigon
og_meta_data.og_description: We partnered with Japanese artist Takashi Murakami, Vans, and Hypebeast to create a film about Murakami's creative collaboration with Vans

challenge.title: Description
challenge.text: We partnered with Japanese artist Takashi Murakami, Vans, and Hypebeast to create a film about Murakami's creative collaboration with Vans

text_img.text: We worked with Japanese artist Takashi Murakami, Vans, and Hypebeast to create a film about Murakami's creative collaboration with Vans. We were invited to Murakami’s massive atelier / production warehouse north of Tokyo, along with his office in Nakano to document his creative process and workflow and the story behind how him and Vans came together to create the iconic set of Vans slip-on sneakers.
text_img.title: Showing the creative process of Takashi Murakami

text_img.text: Takashi Murakami has created a very distinct and unique world of his own. One that he inhabits and embodies everyday of his life. We approached this project with the intention of capturing this world as faithfully as possible through VFX, music, and styling. We were under extreme time constraints and has no opportunity for any location scouting or pre-production arrangements so we had to get creative on the fly with whatever was at our disposal, which was his wild, colourful outfits, zany personality, and excessively expansive workspace. We made sure to style him as colourfully as possible in order to offset the rather bland and uninteresting background of his workspace. The extensive post-production VFX was implemented to show his animated world while compensating for our limited shooting time space.
text_img.title: The crazy mind and world of Takashi Murakami

_data.title: NIGHT GOGGLES by Mindchatter

og_meta_data.og_title: Night Goggles | DỰ ÁN | monopo saigon
og_meta_data.og_description: Hãng đĩa 'Mind of a Genius' tìm đến chúng tôi với mong muốn tạo ra một video âm nhạc cho nghệ sĩ Mindchatter. Với dự án này, chúng tôi kiểm soát hoàn toàn ý tưởng và hướng sáng tạo. Vì dự án được thực hiện trong giai đoạn đại dịch, nguồn cảm hứng đến từ câu hỏi chúng tôi đặt ra với chính mình: nơi nào bên ngoài trái đất muốn có được hạnh phúc và được nhảy múa mãi mãi, đặc biệt là trong giai đoạn đại dịch? Chúng tôi cố gắng mô tả một thế giới nơi mình có thể chạy trên những cánh đồng rộng lớn, hít thở bầu không khí trong lành mà không cần phải quay lại nơi chúng tôi từng sống để có thể khám phá thế giới vô tận. Đây cũng là một tiếng vọng cho một trong những câu hỏi lớn nhất mà nhân loại đang đặt ra: điều gì sẽ xảy đến tiếp theo?

_data.title: Canada Goose  — Nomad Collection

og_meta_data.og_description: Monopo负责为Canada goose和 Gore-Tex 的以春天和雨季为灵感的 “Nomad Capsule Collection” 制作 360 度全方位创意广告。 我们负责提供想法，创意策划，艺术指导，文案，视频制作，编辑与社交媒体内容，零售剧院与国际艺术装置等。
og_meta_data.og_title: Canada Goose — Nomad Collection | 项目 | monopo saigon

tags: 为“Nomad Collection” 提供创意策划

og_meta_data.og_description: 随着虚拟世界和名人文化的融合，虚拟网红已成为一种创意媒介，可以以令人兴奋的方式与年轻一代互动。我们接触过对虚拟网红感兴趣的品牌，其中之一是 Freefire 手机游戏，他们想为其游戏角色 SKYLER 推出一支 MV。
og_meta_data.og_title: 数字网红 | 项目 | monopo saigon

_data.title: La Dame de Soie – Cartier x Nowness

og_meta_data.og_description: 在 Cartier 和 Nowness 的合作中，以黄慧兰夫人的人生、她对卡地亚的影响为基础，我们负责创作了一个简短、时尚的半虚构作品，通过仔细调研的剧本和艺术指导，将故事融入当代框架中呈现。
og_meta_data.og_title: 卡地亚 - 《穿丝绸的女人》| 项目 | monopo saigon

og_meta_data.og_description: 厂牌“Mind of a Genius”联系我们为艺术家 Mindchatter 制作一支音乐视频，并交付我们完全把控创意概念和方向。这个项目恰好在疫情期间，因此主题的灵感来自我们问自己这个问题的那一刻：地球之外，哪里有让人想要快乐并永远跳舞地方？我们试图描述一个世界，在那里我们可以在广阔的田野上奔跑，呼吸新鲜空气，不必回到我们原来的地方，而是无止境地发现世界，回应人类一直在疑惑的一个大问题：下一步是什么?
og_meta_data.og_title: 夜间护目镜 | 项目 | monopo saigon

_data.title: Super Dan Origin Digital Graphic Novel

og_meta_data.og_title: 林丹INSTAGRAM漫画小说 | 项目 | monopo saigon
og_meta_data.og_description: 当 monopo London 受邀为中国羽毛球传奇人物林丹开设 Instagram 帐户，我们决定重新向世界介绍他的天赋异禀。我们与插画家 AmCo Studio 合作，为数字时代制作了一本漫画小说。可滚动，可滑动，可共享。一个九集的原创故事，讲述了林丹从出生到成为超级英雄的崛起

_data.title: Takashi Murakami

og_meta_data.og_title: 村上隆 x Vans | 项目 | monopo saigon
og_meta_data.og_description: 我们与日本艺术家村上隆，Vans 和 Hypebeast 合作，制作了一部关于村上隆与 Vans 创意合作的影片

tags: 为村上隆和 Vans 合作提供创意策划
为 Hypebeast 提供视频制作
